summary: An arrogant and cheeky archer, Dimitri has been a follower in my adventures for a long time. I figure it's time to share him. :)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#990000][size=5]Dimitri by CrimsonFairy[/size][/color]

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Description[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've had a lot of people ask me about him, so I decided to hoard him to myself no longer. :P That's right, as hard as it is to give away my favorite custom follower I'm releasing him anyway! Because I love these people here and I can be greedy no longer. T^T But do take care of him!

[size=4](Short Background)[/size] Dimitri was raised by his brother Jasper in the Falkreath hold where he mastered the arts of archery and stealth. Dimitri remained in that part of Skyrim for most of his life, even after his brother went off on his own. He often hunts in the surrounding forests of Falkreath and lives in the Dead Man's Drink. His arrogance, boastfulness, and sometimes humorous but annoying wittiness keeps him from making friends with the local folk, but he usually gains the ladies attention despite all that. He can also be mischievous, cheerful at times, and underneath his mask of callousness (though he denies it constantly) he does care for people.

[size=4](Perks)[/size] He mainly just uses archery. He has perks in archery, one-handed, light armor and sneak.

[size=4](Location)[/size] You can find him at the Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath. But if you are using the version for users of Interesting NPCs then his location will be at the guard Barracks in Falkreath.

[size=4](Other stuff)[/size]Â I was planning on giving him some dialogue, but I can't since I have no time for modding anymore, so hopefully the description above provides enough to at least get an idea of what Dimitri's like.

Dimitri is also a part of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/227805/?]The Mercenary series[/url] by me. You might be interested in reading it if you want to know more about his personality and story. I never finished it but the third has a little about Dimitri in it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Note from Author (This section isn't important regarding this mod, so you can skip it if you want.)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This will most likely be the last mod I release here on the Skyrim Nexus... I just don't have time for modding like I used to and I'm not as in to it. Maybe I'll come back for the next Elder Scrolls game, but for now I'm retiring from modding. It has been so fun, and I've learned so much and had a lot of fun. I'd like to thank everyone who ever gave me advice and helped me out, even with the smaller things like pointing me in the direction of a tutorial, and for putting up with me when I still couldn't figure things out. ;D I also want to thank everyone who has ever left a kind comment on one of my mods, it really did encourage me during modding. ^^ I'll still be around to monitor my mods and release necessary updates but I just won't be releasing any completely new mods. Dimitri will be my last released follower, and I hope you all enjoy having him in your game as much as I do.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Requirements/Recommended[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Required:[/size]

The standalone male version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]. It looks like this: ApachiiSkyHairMale. Any newer version should work just as well.
The latest Skyrim patch 1.9.

[size=4]Recommended:[/size]
The mods listed below are the mods not required for this one to work, but are used in some of the screenshots. Not all mods are listed:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25832/?]Crimson Ranger Armor.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures by Urshi.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498//?]High Quality Eyes by Xenius.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?]The Eyes of Beauty.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39983//?]DreamBurrows Regal Huntsman Armor.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36875/?]Armor of Intrigue.[/url]

NOTE: Dimitri's eyes will turn to a more brownish color if you use The Eyes of Beauty, but they are supposed to be green.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Install/Uninstall[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You can either install the mod by using the Nexus Mod Manager or you can follow the manual installation instructions below.

Manual installation instructions:
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. It shouldn't ask you to overwrite anything. And that's it! If you use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037//?]UFO[/url] then you're supposed to load follower mods under the UFO.esp in order for UFO changes to affect them.

To uninstall, go into the Skyrim Data folder and delete Dimitri by CrimsonFairy.esp and then go to Meshes, actors, character, FaceGenData, Facegeom, and delete the folder Dimitri by CrimsonFairy. Then go back to the Skyrim data folder and navigate to Textures, Actors, Character, FacegenData, FaceTint, and delete the folder Dimitri by CrimsonFairy.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Credits[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Apachii for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]hairstyle[/url].

Nouserhere for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20707/?]ears[/url].

TairenSoul for the warpaint.

MissMorose for testing.

Kamikazekossori for testing.

And thanks to everyone else who encouraged me too release him and helped me out when I had any problems I couldn't solve. ^^

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Usage/Permission[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
If you want to do something with my mod (as in, translating or uploading it somewhere) then you'll have to get permission from me first. If I give you my permission then you'll be directed to a couple other people you'll have to get permission from as well.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Bugs/Incompatibilities[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Some people have crashing issues when using this mod with Interesting NPCs. Please let me know if you find any other problems!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Other follower mods of mine:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32564/?]Talvas Fathryon Remake.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30894/?]Belrand Remake.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28862/?]Azalea Follower.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27620/?]Onmund Remake.[/url]

And here's a list of some of my favorite follower mods (not all are listed or can be found on Nexus):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23748//?]AKHAZIIR The khajiit scout follower.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29953/?]Julien Christophe - Priest of Mara.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25249/?]Alvhilde - Nord Werewolf Huntress - Follower Mod.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23779/?]The Dovahkiins New Allies by Netherwalk.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32503/?]Mhillis Tuise - A Follower.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32498/?]Casteo - the Wanderer.[/url]
